properties.title: Java date and time API - Upgrade from 2.8.1 to 2.8.2
properties.author: Stephen Colebourne

section.name: Upgrade
section.p:
These are the release notes and advice for upgrading Joda-Time from version 2.8.1 to version 2.8.2.
Joda-Time version 2.8.2 -----------------------
Joda-Time is a date and time handling library that seeks to replace the JDK Date and Calendar classes.
This release contains enhancements, bug fixes and a time zone update. The release runs on JDK 5 or later.
Joda-Time is licensed under the business-friendly Apache License Version 2. This is the same license as all of Apache, plus other open source projects such as Spring.
** Please also check out our related projects ** ** http://www.joda.org/joda-time/related.html **
Changes in 2.8.2 ================ - DateTimeZone data updated to version 2015f
Changes in 2.8.1 ================ See http://www.joda.org/joda-time/upgradeto281.html
